nodes.text: Kibnon stimulant pollen was a type of pollen associated with the Kibnon. At some point prior to or during 10 BBY, while writing in the book known as the Smuggler's Guide, the pirate queen Maz Kanata listed the substance as one of the cargoes worth most profit per kilogram for smugglers to carry.
Kibnon stimulant pollen was first mentioned in Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, a reference book written by Daniel Wallace and released in 2018.
